short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your favorite users on Hacker News

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Follow Hackers it's easy to see what stories your favorite hacker news users are discussing and what they are saying.

How it works:
1) Follow and unfollow users from their user pages.
2) See a list of users you are following from your user page.
3) If a user you follow comments on a story that story will be highlighted.
4) Comments in discussion threads by users you follow will be highlighted.
5) Quickly jump to comments by users you follow.

Notes:
- Check out http://news.ycombinator.com/leaders for some recommended users to follow.
- The Source: https://github.com/ImFatYoureFat/follow_hackers .
- Having issues? Let me know at https://github.com/ImFatYoureFat/follow_hackers/issues
